name: WKURLSchemeTask
desc: An interface that WebKit uses to request custom resources from your app.

items.name: var request: URLRequest
items.desc: Information about the resource to load.

items.name: func didReceive(URLResponse)
items.desc: Returns a URL response to WebKit with information about the requested resource.

items.name: func didReceive(Data)
items.desc: Sends some or all of the resource data to WebKit.

items.name: func didFinish()
items.desc: Signals the successful completion of the task.

items.name: func didFailWithError(Error)
items.desc: Completes the task and reports the specified error back to WebKit.
